verbs.description: [ARG0: pirates] [V: buy] out [ARG1: harrison kang] [ARGM-ADV: making them free agents] the pittsburgh pirates declined the 2019 club options for josh harrison and jung ho kang on wednesday making both players free agents for the 2019 season kang pittsburgh pirates jung ho kang harrison jordy mercer josh harrison
